description: Balsamic onions and gruyere cheese make a rich filling for these delicious Turkish pides.
name: Cheese & Onion Pide Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the flour, sugar, yeast and salt into a large bowl and stir to combine. Add 80ml of warm water and 2 tablespoons of oil and mix to combine. Tip on to a lightly floured work surface and knead for 5 minutes until smooth and springy.
Place in an oiled bowl and cover with a damp towel. Set aside to rise in a warm place for 1 hour.
Add the remaining oil to a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 1215 minutes until beginning to caramelise. Add the balsamic and thyme cook for 2 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Tip the dough on to a floured work surface and cut into 4 pieces. Roll each piece into an oval shape.

Place the dough ovals on a lined baking tray and spoon the onions onto each, sprinkling a layer of cheese on top. Leave a border around the edges and roll up to form a crust. Brush the edges with beaten egg and bake for 1015 minutes until golden and crisp.
